thread.title: Joan Larson
thread.title_full: Floor to Ceiling Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Joan Larson

author: Joan Larson
title: Joan Larson
text: I needed to replace the carpet on the top floor of my twin home. After putting it off for over a year I attended an open house at the Fargo Floor to Ceiling Store. I was delighted to work with a Mohawk rep. After taking home some samples, I returned to the store to work with a salesperson. Karen helped me chose carpet and vinyl. The carpet installation was flawless and I am thrilled with the final results. I couldn't have been happier with the end result.
